pages.text: $(li)The Rabbit Hide is a resistant material.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft Leather, Slingshots, Bonded Rabbit Hide, Seed Pouch and even a Backpack.$(br)$(li)The Leatherworker will change this material by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)Rabbits may drop Rabbit Hide when they are slayed.
$(li)Rabbits may drop Rabbit Hide when they are slayed.
